# userInterfaceDirectionPolicy

**Instance Property**

The directionality of user interface elements.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userInterfaceDirectionPolicy: WKUserInterfaceDirectionPolicy
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `.content`.
